name: Legalize! Privacy Policy and Terms of Service
author: CodeRevolution

sections.description: Legalize! - Makes life easier by automatically generating mandatory 'Privacy Policy' and 'Terms of Service' pages for your website!
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0 Release Date 2016-10-30
  • First version released!

Version 1.1 Release Date 2016-11-20
  • New feature added - EU cookie consent popup! Check it out!
  • Fixed some minor issues

Version 1.2 Release Date 2016-12-2
  • New feature added - German translation for Privacy Policy and Terms of Service Pages!
  • Added the ability to add custom text to the Privacy Policy or the Terms of Service pages
  • Fixed some minor issues
Version 1.3 Release Date 2017-01-10
  • New feature added - Option to add a 'I accept this website's Terms of Service' checkbox to login and register forms!
  • Fixed some minor issues
